title: Is there going to be updated Noxus Lore arriving with Swain Update?
body:
Every reworked champion thus far came with new backstories for characters from the area.

Targon, Shurima, Shadow Isles - most champions from those areas received around a 2-3 page story to really bring these worlds to life!

If so, would we be seeing the likes of {{champion:7}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:122}}  {{champion:119}}  getting some story additions?

Love the work the lore department puts into the characters, and I would love to see Noxus get some lore that ties the world together!

{{sticker:katarina-love}} {{sticker:leblanc-funny}} {{sticker:darius-angry}} {{sticker:draven-pose}}

replies.body: How many Crimson boys are getting lore?

I hope so!
But if I had to choose 2 Noxian champs to receive lore update, they would be LeBlanc and Vladimir.

I definetly want to learn more about {{champion:55}} .
Basically, because in the old lore was this "Enemy Civil War" setting between her and {{champion:50}} , and I wish this still remains in the cannon.
On the other hand, the new lore about {{champion:8}} as a creature old as Noxus, and most probably a creator of blood magic, it's interesting to follow, to see where they go to with somehting like that. I know they are a basically a cliché in every fantasy story right now, but I wish there is a vampire cohort created by his blood magic obeying his every command. Even if he is not one, with him using blood magic, I always saw it as a lost chance.
We need a black rose update{{champion:7}} {{champion:60}} {{champion:8}}  everything else can wait for the time being

Well, Urgot already received some lore loving with his update, and Darius/Draven got some from the comic they featured in, so if they are left out, it'll be fine. If they are the only ones who get lore updates....that'd be a damn crime.
With the amount of Vlad lore requests by numerous people on these boards it would be a bit mean of Riot not to include him.
Don’t you mean multiple threads by you and Tides?{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Strangely enough, no. Use the search bar.
I would suspect Leblanc and Vladimir at the very least since both were involved with the resurrection of Sion
Implying that they'll do anything for Vlad {{sticker:vlad-salute}}

It's a guaranteed yes considering Swain in a integral part to many people's lore. If they change him, they have to change all the lore he affects. This will probably include, but not limited to:

* LeBlanc
* Sion
* Vladimir
* Elise
* Darius
* Draven

There better be, also a Noxus profile Icon to go with my Demacian one.

https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/f/fb/Icons_concept_03.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161208135759

I know you made one Riot, you cant fool me. Concept art doesnt lie.
